annotations.description: What if I told you one whiskey and an amaro and an aperitif tasted like Cola when mixed together? Well, wipe that disbelief off your face and watch this vide...
annotations.title: A Cocktail which tastes like Cola, But There is no Cola! Behold: Cocchi Cola

textContent:
1.5oz (45ml) Tennessee Whiskey
.75oz (22.5ml) Cocchi Americano
.5oz (15ml) Amaro Nonino
1 Dash Tiki Bitters (3 drops)

Stir over ice and strain into coupe

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kG4YC9vdI1I
title: Cocchi Cola
